<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>ml_label_candidate</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete UFT records on LCT record delete</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var uftGr = new GlideRecord('ml_label_user_feedback'); uftGr.addQuery('utterance_reference', current.sys_id); uftGr.query();
if (uftGr.next()) { uftGr.deleteRecord(); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-06 12:48:49</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>1c6c5efec7161110c59d3d9c95c26002</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete UFT records on LCT record delete</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features" source="sn_nlu_workbench">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1c6c5efec7161110c59d3d9c95c26002</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-07 14:20:29</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1c6c5efec7161110c59d3d9c95c26002"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete UFT records on LCT record delete
